properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET PHONE=? ,EMAIL=? ,ADDRESS=? ,MODIFIED_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID=?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS='N' ,MODIFIED_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD=?
SELECT MEMBER_NO,NICKNAME,ABOUTME FROM MYPAGE WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE MYPAGE SET NICKNAME=? ,ABOUTME=? WHERE MEMBER_NO=?
UPDATE MYPAGE SET PROPILE_ORIGIN=? ,PROPILE_CHANGE=? ,FILE_PATH=? WHERE MEMBER_NO =?
